instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 3115 boots half way then resets
threads.message: 3115, no liquid damage, boots just over half way, then resets about 3 times in a row, then tries resetting again. Any clue? SMC?

threads.title: 3115 boots half way then resets
threads.message: i had the same problem on my macbook. have you tried to change ram? it works for me

threads.title: 3115 boots half way then resets
threads.message: No but when I mess with them (change position, take one out etc.) it changes how fast it boots and resets. Will try.
